item.title: Hormel Foods says consumers are ‘strained’ as they trade down or hunt for value, but maintains outlook for the year
item.description: On an earnings call this week Hormel Foods said consumers are feeling strained, but are adjusting their spending habits for maximum value which may in...

item.title: Removing fluoride from public water systems would result in dental disaster for millions of Americans, study warns
item.description: A new study projects what the effects of removing fluoride from water nationwide would be—and the findings are a dentist’s nightmare.

item.title: Barack Obama says work-life balance isn’t real for successful people
item.description: Even former President Obama admits: you can’t have it all—at least not at once.

item.title: Gap says Trump’s tariffs could cost the company a whopping $300 million, sending shares into a tailspin
item.description: The company behind Banana Republic and Old Navy fell 19% after saying tariffs on imports could add up to $300 million in costs.

item.title: The 13-year-old who won the Scripps National Spelling Bee almost choked at the end because he got too cocky: ‘I think he cared too much about his aura’
item.description: Faizan Zaki was two words away from victory, but let his showman instincts take over.
